revised_title: The Discovery of Toluidine and its Role in Aniline-Red Formation
tldr: A. W. Hofmann investigates the formation of aniline-red colorant and discovers that it is derived from a mixture of aniline and toluidine. He also finds that commercial aniline contains a higher boiling point substance, which is identified as toluidine. The presence of toluidine in commercial aniline is crucial for the formation of aniline-red colorant.
